name: My First Date RPG (Presented by: ExecuteCode.com)
name_original: My First Date RPG (Presented by: ExecuteCode.com)
description:
In the "My First Date RPG" series, play as characters who experience a big part of growing up: going out on your first date!

Oriana, a high school senior, is a little disappointed that she's about to end high school without ever going out on a date with a guy. Will she go out with a guy before the year is over?

Also, there's tips and advice here to help you as you begin or continue dating in your own life!

New stories are added with free updates to the game!

[Game Features]
-Multiple playable characters
-Simple game play and controls
-Dating tips and advice that could help you in your own life!


[This game is recommended for people who enjoy or are looking for...]
-the My First Date RPG series
-the Project: Summer Ice series
-educational games
-games parents can use to help their children understand dating
-games parents can use to start discussions with their children
-dating games
-Christian anime
-a game with Christian themes
-story based games
-simple games
-romance games
-an anime game featuring Bible principles
-Bible based games
-JRPG
-2D games
-a Christian themed game that anyone can play
